greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of nonnegative integers obtained by interleaving A117967 and A117968.
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2186
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(n) = A117967(A001057(n)). (Assuming that the domain of A117967 is the whole Z line.)
program: def a004488(n): return int("".join([str((3 - i)%3) for i in digits(n, 3)[1:]]), 3)
def a117967(n): return 0 if n==0 else a117968(-n) if n<0 else a004488(a117968(n))
def a(n): return a117967(a001057(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 07 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 19 2008, originally described in a posting at the SeqFan mailing list on Sep 15 2005.
